Shiny Apps

The TreeDetectoR Shiny App



Tree detection in a Shiny app, try it yourself below!


Download the ITD example ShinyApp (.zip)
Contains:
itd_shiny.R - an R script containing the tree detection Shiny App components
data/chm_ext - four example 0.25 m Canopy Height Models (CHM)
Instructions:

Download and extract contents to a folder
Open itd_shiny.R in RStudio and run entire script to start up the shiny app
Load an example CHM (or your own) and play around



More resources

Getting started with shinyapps.io (web hosting)
Read the Shiny textbook, there is no better resource.
